qas.question: In what year did the Korean War begin?
What caused the start of the Korean War?
What country was divided at the end of World War II?
Which country aided South Korea during the war?
When did the Korean War end?

context: The Korean War (in South Korean Hangul: 한국전쟁, Hanja: 韓國戰爭, Hanguk Jeonjaeng, "Korean War"; in North Korean Chosungul: 조국해방전쟁, Joguk Haebang Jeonjaeng, "Fatherland Liberation War"; 25 June <a0_0>1950<a0_0/> – <a4_0>27 July 1953<a4_0/>)[a] was started when <a1_0>North <a2_0>Korea<a2_0/> invaded South Korea<a1_0/>. The United Nations, with <a3_0>United States<a3_0/> as the principal force, came to aid of South Korea. China, along with assistance from Soviet Union, came to aid of North Korea. The war arose from the division of Korea at the end of World War II and from the global tensions of the Cold War that developed immediately afterwards.
